short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Immerse yourself in the tranquil beauty of Mystic Island

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Showcases a breathtaking island with lush greenery and a cascading waterfall, set against a dreamy, mystical sky. Ideal for nature lovers and those seeking a touch of serenity in their browsing experience, this theme brings a peaceful, otherworldly atmosphere to your screen. Let "Mystic Island" transport you to a hidden paradise every time you open your browser.

Key features:
- Beautiful background.
- Quick access to frequently visited sites.
- Customizable search bar and shortcuts.
- Real-time weather display and clock.
